articles.description: Get your first peek at films like 'Knives Out 2' and a big-budget thriller from the Russo brothers..
articles.content:
Just like it did
 last year, Netflix
 will release at least one movie a week in 2022. There are currently more than 70 films on the docket for this year, and the company offered
